channel.title: Sarah's Website - Sarah Rogue
channel.description: Welcome to the blog of Sarah Rogue

item.title: Using Google Drive on Arch Linux - KDE Plasma
item.description: definitive steps to get Google Drive to work under Dolphin, the KDE file manager
item.dc:creator: Sarah Rogue

item.title: Monster Profile
item.description: i asked ChatGPT to read my tweets and figure out what kind of Halloween monster i am. the Tarot card displayed is from Gemini
item.dc:creator: Sarah Rogue

item.title: How To Configure Your Fish Prompt
item.description: shows how to get the CachyOS features of the command shell fish into other GNU/Linux like Fedora 42
item.dc:creator: Sarah Rogue

item.title: WinBoat for GNU/Linux
item.description: WinBoat is a GNU/Linux app that runs various versions of Windows. i fucked up the first time installing it and had a bitch of a time uninstalling it
item.dc:creator: Sarah Rogue
